name: do-not-copy-hyphens
description: Prevents soft hyphens from being copy-pasted with regular text
author: egilll

scripts.build:
webpack index.js --output dist/index.js --mode=production --optimize-minimize false && echo '0a
/*! do-not-copy-hyphens v1.0 | MIT | https://github.com/egilll/do-not-copy-hyphens */
.
w' | ed dist/index.js
